docs.title: doc.jp Landing Page
docs.text:
What to expect?

There will be some a transition period while I figure out how I want the documentation to be formatted.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This is where I'll house my long term goals for learning Japanese.

docs.title: Goals
docs.text:
• Take and Pass the JLPT N4
  • Play Persona 5 Royal in Japanese with Japanese Subtitles by my 29th birthday
  • Watch Parasyte: The Maxim in japanese with Japanese subtitles by my 29th birthday

docs.title: October 2023 Goals
docs.text:
• Finish Japanese From Zero book 2
  • Learn 300 vocabulary words 10 per day (will bring me to 569 vocabulary words learned)
  • Immerse with two episodes of Laid Back Camp (Yuru Camp)

docs.title: The ましょう verb ending is added to the verb root to say things like let's go, or let's eat. In question form, ましょう means Shall we~?
